definitions.definition: In contrast ; whilst on the contrary ; although .
examples: He came first in the race, whereas his brother came last.

definitions.definition: It being the fact that; inasmuch as . (Often used to begin recitals ; sometimes emboldened or emphasized as a signifier .)

main_definition: In contrast ; whilst on the contrary ; although .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly law ) It being the fact that; inasmuch as . (Often used to begin recitals ; sometimes emboldened or emphasized as a signifier .)
